verses.verse: Then you will <S%H559>say<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> "I will <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> For although Thou <S%H599>wast<s%> <S%H599>angry<s%> with me, Thine <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>away,<s%> And Thou dost <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me.

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> is my <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> I will <S%H982>trust<s%> and not be <S%H6342>afraid;<s%> For the <S%H3050>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H2176>song,<s%> And He has <S%H1961>become<s%> my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>"
Therefore you will <S%H8342>joyously<s%> <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> From the <S%H4599>springs<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>

And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> you will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3034>"Give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> on His <S%H8034>name.<s%> <S%H3045>Make<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> His <S%H5949>deeds<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> Make [them] <S%H2142>remember<s%> that His <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7682>exalted.<s%>"

<S%H2167>Praise<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in <S%H2167>song,<s%> for He has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H1348>excellent<s%> <S%H1348>things;<s%> Let <S%H384>this<s%> be <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H3605>throughout<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H6670>Cry<s%> <S%H6670>aloud<s%> and <S%H7442>shout<s%> for <S%H7442>joy,<s%> O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> For <S%H1419>great<s%> in your <S%H7130>midst<s%> is the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
